titleStmt.title: A proclamacion, set furthe by the Kynges Maiestie, with the aduise of his highnes most honorable priuie counsail, in the v. yere of his highnes most prosperous reigne, for the prices of victualles
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)
Edward VI, King of England, 1537-1553.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
